applyTo: "*"

# Core Principles

- Always follow the best web development standards.
- Always prefer pure functions and immutability.
- Always prefer code composition over inheritance.
- Always make code changes in a simple and concise manner.
- Always write code that is easy to read and understand.

# Rust

- Always prefer using the standard library (std).
- Never use wildcard imports (e.g., use std::collections::\*).
